info.title: Tarken Inspector API
info.description:
The HUB API is organized in REST. Our API has predictable resource oriented URLs, accepts form-encoded request bodies, returns JSON-encoded responses, and uses HTTP response codes, authentication and verbs. You can use this API to list rural properties, customers, registration data, credit bureau, compliance, related people, lawsuits, state registration, warehouses, seasons, areas, productive areas, CPR, SCR, IRPF and etc, it is also possible to request analyzes of this information.

URL: https://prod.api.hub.tarken.ag

servers.description: Server to access the HUB routes.

bearer.description: Authentication to the API is performed via Bearer authentication. Provide your token as the bearer value.

currentCrop.description: The crop on the current season of this area. Will be `undefined` if no crop was found on this area

inquiryAuthorName.description: Will be defined if the inquiry source is `SERASA`

fieldName.description: Will be defined if the inquiry source is `BOA_VISTA`

url.description: The URL to make the POST request in order to upload the file.

fields.description: A key-value object containing all fields that the client must send as the form data payload along with the file to upload.

ownerOrganizationId.description: Must be the value of current membership organization id

name.description: User-land file name with extension. When not defined, the value will be inferred from object's metadata

ownerOrganizationId.description: Must be the value of current membership organization id

id.description: The ID of from CNAEs catalog. Omit this if the CNAE is not in the catalog

code.description: This is mandatory if `id` is not provided

endDate.description: Use `null` to remove the end date.

currentMembershipOrganizationId.description: Must be the value of current membership organization id

uploadUrl.description: The URL to make the POST request in order to upload the file.

fields.description: A key-value object containing all fields that the client must send as the form data payload along with the file to upload.

whenEvaluator.description: For which evaluator result this action should be triggered.

extraNativeFields.description: A key-value entry with extra native fields for the given form entity. The key should be field's identifier.

authorUser.description: This will be `undefined` if the user was not found.

name.description: Must contains this substring in their name, in a case-insensitive manner.

author.description: If the user does not exists anymore, this will be `undefined`

phase.description: Will be `undefined` if the phase does not exists anymore

author.description: If the user does not exists anymore, this will be `undefined`

authorUser.description: This will be `undefined` if the user was not found.

sourceRecord.description: Can be `undefined` if source was not found

authorUser.description: This will be `undefined` if the user was not found.

sourceRecord.description: Can be `undefined` if source was not found

authorUser.description: This will be `undefined` if the user was not found.

sourceRecord.description: Can be `undefined` if source was not found

contactId.description: If present, the review will be made for the given contact only, which should be a member of the given customer (`customerId`).
If present, the review will be made for the given contact only, which should be a member of the given customer (`customerId`).
If present, the review will be made for the given contact only, which should be a member of the given customer (`customerId`).

reviewAvailableValue.description: Only available if customer has an active credit limit review

reviewTotalValue.description: Only available if customer has an active credit limit review with total value set

dueDate.description: Only available if customer has an active credit limit review and said credit limit review has a due date

reviewAvailableValue.description: Only available if contact has an active credit limit review

reviewTotalValue.description: Only available if contact has an active credit limit review with a total value set

dueDate.description: Only available if contact has an active credit limit review and said credit limit review has a due date

summary.description: Contacts will only have a summary if they have an active credit limit review & operations

authorUser.description: This will be `undefined` if the user was not found.

field.description: All custom field values of the given ticket, in a plain object.

specieName.description: Will be `undefined` if the specie was not found in our catalog.

breedName.description: Will be `undefined` if the breed was not found in our catalog.

field.description: All custom field values of the given customer in a plain object.

version.description: If not supplied, this value will be defined using the current time in the server.

definition.description: This is required when `definitionDraftId` is missing.

definitionDraftId.description: This is required when `definition` is missing. This should be a document path to the definition that will be used.

ticketId.description: This is required when no `rawContext` is supplied

customerId.description: This is required when no `rawContext` is supplied

creditLimitDefinitionId.description: This is required when `scoreDefinition` is missing. This should be a document path to the definition that will be used.

rawContext.description: This is required when neither `ticketId` nor `customerId` are supplied

scoreDefinition.description: This is required when `creditLimitDefinitionId` is missing.

month.description: Must be informed in create endpoint

type.description: Must be informed in create endpoint

measure.description: Must be informed in create endpoint

detailedData.description: Must be informed in update and create endpoint

csvFile.description: Must be informed in validate endpoint (POST)

month.description: Must be informed in create endpoint

measure.description: Must be informed in create endpoint

csvFile.description: Must be informed in validate endpoint (POST)

detailedData.description: Must be informed in update and create endpoint

specie.description: Will be `undefined` if the specie was not found in our catalog.

breed.description: Will be `undefined` if the breed was not found in our catalog.

customerId.description: This is mandatory when `contactId` is not supplied.

contactId.description: This is mandatory when `customerId` is not supplied.

customerId.description: This is mandatory when `contactId` is not supplied.

contactId.description: This is mandatory when `customerId` is not supplied.

author.description: If the user does not exists anymore, this will be `undefined`

customerId.description: This is mandatory when `contactId` is not supplied.

contactId.description: This is mandatory when `customerId` is not supplied.
